name: Pochi My Virtual Dog (Android)
description:
Take care of this dog and give it a new name in settings :)

Dont mind the bugs tho :D

Beta only what you can do?

Pet him/her

Feed him/her

Make him /her sleep

Awake him/her

Change dog name

Developing (Coming soon)

Take bath

Medecine

Mini games

Drawer

Shop
